mapper.sql: mes_id, id, mname, minimum_size, surplusmedine, balancestatus, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into drug_surplus
id,
mname,
minimum_size,
surplusmedine,
balancestatus,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{minimumSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{surplusmedine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{balancestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update drug_surplus
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
minimum_size = #{minimumSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusmedine = #{surplusmedine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
balancestatus = #{balancestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where mes_id = #{mesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drug_surplus set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minimum_size = #{minimumSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surplusmedine = #{surplusmedine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balancestatus = #{balancestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where mes_id = #{mesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.mes_id,B.id,B.mname,B.minimum_size,B.surplusmedine,B.balancestatus,B.create_time, P.oldpeople_name from drug_surplus B inner join jd_oldpeople P on B.id = P.oldpeople_id
